DOC.brief_summary: This study is a retrospective review of chart. Clinical results including range of motion, muscle power and scores will be recorded. Arthrocopic surgery of cruciate ligament and meniscus will be re-evaluated for clinical application.
DOC.brief_title: Results of Knee Arthroscopic Surgery for Treatment of Cruciate Ligament and Meniscus
DOC.criteria: ACL reconstructions PCL reconstructions Meniscectomy or Meniscus repair Open surgery for knee lesion Combined fracture or other associated injury around knee
